insights.title: USA: +48.7K (+8.0%)
insights.text: United States leads growth with 660,504 TTM passengers, up 48,752 from prior period. Summer peak (Jun-Aug) averaged 96K/month. Strongest North American market by 5x vs Canada.

insights.title: UK: -28.2K (-10.1%)
insights.text: United Kingdom declined to 249,982 passengers, largest absolute drop among top markets. Feb-Mar showed recovery (+41K, +18K) but summer months underperformed. Market share fell to 11.8%.

insights.title: Germany: Steady 13.7%
insights.text: Germany maintained 289,836 TTM passengers with minimal YoY change. Most stable European market. Oct 2025 saw 13,307 passengers vs 17,246 prior year, signaling potential Q4 softness.

insights.title: Foreign: 2.3M (+2.5%)
insights.text: Total foreign passengers reached 2,296,836 TTM (+55,857). Growth concentrated in USA and Central Europe. Iceland domestic stable at 56,430 Oct passengers. 92% of traffic is international.

insights.title: Oct 2025: 199.7K (-6.2%)
insights.text: Latest month shows 199,689 total passengers vs 212,867 Oct 2024. Second consecutive monthly decline after summer peak. YoY comparisons turning negative entering winter season.
